message:
The memory usage of the Redis instance projects/handshake-demo/locations/us-central1/instances/handshake-app-splendid-squid is growing rapidly. If this is sustained, then the instance may reach it's max capacity soon.

@slack-incidents-infrastructure,@slack-incidents-cloud-engineering
name: Redis instance handshake-demo/handshake-app-splendid-squid is growing rapidly
